info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 01 at 2:58PM PDT until September 01 at 3:30PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Clark County in southern Nevada... * Until 330 PM PDT. * At 257 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mountains Edge, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs and trees. * Locations impacted include... Las Vegas, Henderson, Southern Highlands, Mountains Edge, The Strip, Spring Valley, Blue Diamond, Enterprise, Paradise, Green Valley, Summerlin, Silverado Ranch, Mccarran International Airport and The Lakes. This includes the following roads... State Route 159 in Red Rock Canyon between mile markers 1 and 3. State Route 160 in Clark County between mile markers 8 and 16. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
